Description:
Find information about network devices that is not stored in config files

Author: Austin Clark
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Cisco Discovery
Query: sourcetype='cisco-aaa' eql select * from _source_ where (log like '%dir%' or log like '%show arp%' or log like '%show cdp%' or log like '%show clock%' or log like '%show ip interface%' or log like '%show ip route%' or log like '%show ip sockets%' or log like '%show processes%' or log like '%show ssh%' or log like '%show users%' or log like '%show version%')
